summary: S6 Verification for Commerce Rules Engine Suite Demo Page - FINAL Commerce Suite. All tests passed. Page loads correctly at /commerce-rules-demo with all 5 rule category cards, 3 example scenarios per category, Run buttons revealing results, 6 API endpoints, and Nigeria-First info banner.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Commerce Rules Engine Suite Demo Page S6 Verification complete. This is the 8th and FINAL Commerce suite. All features working: 5 rule category cards (Commission, Pricing, Promotion, Inventory, Discount), 3 example scenarios per category with Run buttons, category switching updates examples panel, 6 API endpoints displayed, Nigeria-First Design info banner. Demo uses STATIC data - no live API calls.
